property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Pakistani and U.S. service members assisting young flood victims

note.text: During an HA mission, gaining local support is crucial for mission success.
Working closely with local counterparts and contractors is a good way to gain trust and support within the local population.

Getting direction from locals can also help you determine what issues to address and how to address them. Remember that whatâ€™s important to Pakistanis might not be immediately obvious to Americans, so coordinating with local counterparts can be very useful.
